    • Method Detail

      • hasUpgrade

        public static boolean hasUpgrade(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me,
                                 net.minecraft.item.Item check)
        Checks if the ItemStack has a particular upgrade. You can also call directly on the SteamTool item rather than this. This is only used internally by EI for the actual SteamTool.hasUpgrade(ItemStack, Item) implementations in the steam tool classes.
        Parameters:
        me - The ItemStack version of the drill
        check - The item that is being checked against, or the upgrade
        Returns:
        Whether it has any upgrades.

      • getUpgrades

        public static java.util.ArrayList<SteamToolUpgrade> getUpgrades(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me)
        Gets all of the upgrades (except non-standard ones that do not implement SteamToolUpgrade) that are installed in the tool
        Parameters:
        me - The tool ItemStack.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of all the upgrades. This can be empty. Expect emptiness.

      • getUpgradeStacks

        public static java.util.ArrayList<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> getUpgradeStacks(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack self)
        Exactly like getUpgrades(ItemStack), but obtains ItemStacks instead of SteamToolUpgrade.
        Parameters:
        self - The ItemStack of the tool
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all the upgrade ItemStacks.

      • setNBTInventory

        public static void setNBTInventory(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me,
                                   int slot,
                                   net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Essentially setInventorySlotContents
        Parameters:
        me - The ItemStack being edited.
        slot - ???
        stack - ??? Note: The original method was not documented, so I don't know what these params actually are.

      • checkNBT

        public static net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound checkNBT(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me)
        Checks if the ItemStack has the Speed and Ticks NBT tags. If it doesn't, it creates them and sets them to 0.
        Parameters:
        me - The ItemStack of the tool
        Returns:
        The NBTTagCompound of the tool.

      • getInformationFromStacks

        @Nonnull
public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInformationFromStacks(java.util.ArrayList<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> upgrades,
                                                                                      SteamToolSlot redSlot,
                                                                                      net.minecraft.item.ItemStack tool)
        Gets an ArrayList of the Strings that should be put in the item's tooltip.
        Parameters:
        upgrades - The ItemStacks that are being tested against. See getUpgradeStacks(ItemStack)
        redSlot - The slot that should be red. See ItemSteamTool.getRedSlot().
        Returns:
        The strings. Will return an empty array if there are no upgrades or strings.
